item.title: Post for the week from April 22 to 28
item.description:
Third post

This post is a demo where I demonstrate that I have figured out how to work with posts.

Events of the week

The week passed as usual. No deviations from normality were recorded.

Example of numbering

  1. first item
  2. second item

item.title: Post for the week from April 1 to 7
item.description:
First post

This post is an example where I demonstrate that I figured out how to work with posts 2.0.

The week passed as usual. No deviations from normality were recorded.

Example of numbering

  2. This week there was a test in discrete mathematics.
